::Lord Jhiaxus::

Not far from the old Maximal base, Jhiaxus is standing against a tree, thinking about how to kill his prey.

"I must kill that damn Autobot fool, Kup. He knows too much. I don't want ol' Hot Rod knowing I'm coming for him. It would be very easy if I could get to them right now. Just a nearly deactivated Kup and some local Maximal. I could crush them both easily. Maximal reinforcements are probably on the way though. I need to get through that bases automated defense. Ah hah! Most Maximal vessels have their shield generator located on their dorsal side. My body frame is stronger then what these outdated Cybertronians know of. If I flew directly into their shield grid all the power would be concentrated there. I could withstand that for a moment or two. With all the power concentrating on that location, my rockets could slip past the shields and hit the generator as well as allowing me an entrence. The auto-guns would be a problem but I can out manuver those things. I must work quickly."

Jhiaxus transforms back to jet mode and heads for the Maximal base.

--0-1021088813-1180019986=:98300
Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Lord Jhiaxus::<br><br>Not far from the old Maximal base, Jhiaxus is standing against a tree, thinking about how to kill his prey.<br><br><span style="font-style: italic;">"I must kill that damn Autobot fool, Kup. He knows too much. I don't want ol' Hot Rod knowing I'm coming for him. It would be very easy if I could get to them right now. Just a nearly deactivated Kup and some local Maximal. I could crush them both easily. Maximal reinforcements are probably on the way though. I need to get through that bases automated defense. Ah hah! Most Maximal vessels have their shield generator located on their dorsal side. My body frame is stronger then what these outdated Cybertronians know of. If I flew directly into their shield grid all the power would be concentrated there. I could withstand that for a moment or two. With all the power concentrating on that location, my rockets could slip past the shields and hit the generator as well as allowing me an entrence. The auto-guns
 would be a problem but I can out manuver those things.
